main event: A strip of aluminum foil was found in a field in Richey, Montana.
interesting points: The material found was analyzed and determined to be chaff, used to make radar detection difficult.
The chaff was dropped by aircraft during a practice mission.
The report was sent to the Air Force for analysis and evaluation.
The material was found in a large area, indicating widespread dispersion.
The letter from the Air Force confirmed the material to be chaff and explained its purpose.
